DESCRIPTION
==================
One of the best parts of the series . In Code Veronica know the fate of Claire Redfield from Resident Evil well-known 2 Claire is kidnapped and imprisoned by the people of Umbrella , after the destruction of one of the laboratories corporations.

In comparison to the version on the Sega Dreamcast , only slightly improved graphics , you get the impression that it is more colorful and sharpened . Added a few film interludes on the changes end. However, for those who do not have a Dreamcast , is a must . In Code Veronica know the fate of Claire Redfield from Resident Evil well-known 2 Claire is kidnapped and imprisoned by the people of Umbrella , after the destruction of one of the laboratories corporations. We start in the cold and dark prison cell on Rockfort Island , but what is lighter ... and so begins another great part of the cult game already . Hordes of zombies and other monsters twisted just waiting for us .

Webcams in Code Veronica are always positioned at a good angle , which is extremely important in " survivalach " . To spice up the game , at some point the game takes on , in Chris - Claire 's brother - and to their meeting the action takes place in parallel. In any Residencia , an extremely important role of the storyline , I assure you that in this part we will be surprised again and again. It is worth noting that in many places to meet direct and indirect references to the previous part of the game . After passing Code Veronica get access to a special mode Battle mode - in which we can fight with zombiakami as FPP shooters .
